name: Legends Of Dawn
blurb: Legends Of Dawn is a 3D open-world RPG for PC, set in exciting new fantasy world.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your support! Everyone at Dreamatrix loves you! \r\nWe want to invite you to our forums where you get a place to ask everything about the Legends Of Dawn. All backers will be listed on our web site  recognition pages as someone who helped us to finish this project and remain independent.
DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF LEGENDS OF DAWN! This price is only available for Kickstarter backers, since they are helping us to fund the game before it is released!

Digital only tier - you'll get everything of the original $15 tier plus a new (not in game) vocalized version of the main LoD song The Dawn. This is a newly added tier for stretch goals and is not included in higher tiers.
DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF LEGENDS OF DAWN! + DIGITAL HIGH RESOLUTION GAME MAP + new song, band 8FINITY, world premiere.
Digital COLLECTOR'S BOOK in PDF format.\r\nDIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE SOUNDTRACK from Legends Of Dawn.\r\nPlus all previous rewards.
New BOOK Dwarven Chronicles (PDF)\r\nDifferent collection of WALLPAPERS.\r\nPlus all previous rewards.

Digital only tier - you'll get everything from the $35 tier plus EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF LEGENDS OF DAWN to gift your friends. This is a newly added tier for stretch goals and is not included in higher tiers.

BOX VERSION of Legends Of Dawn. The boxed copy will include a DVD version of the game and the game manual. This is in addition to the digital version of the game (so 2 copies total!). \r\nPlus all previous rewards.
Digital only tier - you'll get everything from the $35 tier plus TWO EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF LEGENDS OF DAWN to gift your friends.

Digital only tier - you'll get everything at the $35 tier plus the Top Secret Development Superpack.
Top Secret Development Superpack includes a lot of materials used or discarded during development process. Beautiful or ugly uncensored stuff.
Imagine you had an opportunity to visit us and were invited to sit in Marko's (head of development) chair and started browsing through endless LoD Project folders on his computer.
You'll find a lot of stuff; screenshots, sketches, ingame shots from early phase, models, textures, animations, early ingame movies, documents, diagrams with game systems we tried etc.
You'll get everything at the $45 tier plus the Top Secret Development Superpack. This is a newly added tier for stretch goals and is not included in higher tiers.
Legends Of Dawn T-SHIRT.\r\nOne Dreamatrix's previously released PC GAME digital download (Spaceforce series).\r\nPlus all previous rewards.
Your name will be added to the silver special thanks list on game credits.\r\nDigital download of two previously released Dreamatrix's titles (Spaceforce series).\r\nPlus all previous rewards.
You get your COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOX with printed new BOOK Dwarven Chronicles.\r\neCard signed by Dreamatrix development team. \r\nPlus all previous rewards.
A GOLD PLEDGE SPECIAL THANKS in the credits\r\n+ 2 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF LEGENDS OF DAWN to gift your friends. \r\nPlus all previous rewards.

For all fantasy lovers! Artists will create original DIGITAL ART picture just for you! And a print will be physically and digitally sent to you. Your name and a personalized message on the info-stone IN-GAME. A Platinum PLEDGE SPECIAL THANKS in the credits. NAME AN NPC (Non-Player Character).\r\n+ 3 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF LEGENDS OF DAWN as a gift for your friends. \r\nPlus all previous rewards.

Be the King!\r\nArtists will create original DIGITAL ART picture just for you with you in main role! And a print will be physically and digitally sent to you. Artists will create a original song for you. Give the name of the song! \r\nPlus all previous rewards.

We really want to thank you for your generous pledge in person.
You must be able to pay for travel and accommodations to the Dreamatrix office in Zagreb, Croatia, Europe. Special program -3 day!
Special SURPRISE GIFT!
Plus all previous rewards.
